henry iv , when besieging paris , had loaves and provisions thrown over the walls . the cardinal had little notes thrown over in which he represented to the rochellais how unjust , selfish , and barbarous was the conduct of their leaders . these leaders had corn in abundance , and would not let them partake of it ; they adopted as a maxim -- for they , too , had maxims -- that it was of very little consequence that women , children , and old men should die , so long as the men who were to defend the walls remained strong and healthy .
